item.title: Enhanced fraud detection using ML and PySpark framework with feature selection
item.description: Introduction Goal To examplify the feature selection strategy in PySpark and furhter enhanc the pyspark pipeline’s performance on fraud detection. In this project, I will continue to work on the data from the project fradu_detection_ML_PySpark. The data exploration will be same, and the feature selction will use input perturbation strtegry instead of PCA as I did in the previous project. Why feature selection? 1.
